39852.name: PISA: Mean performance on the reading scale
39852.description: Average score of 15-year-old students on the PISA reading scale. The metric for the overall reading scale is based on a mean for participating OECD countries set at 500, with a standard deviation of 100. Data reflects country performance in the stated year according to PISA reports, but may not be comparable across years or countries. Consult the PISA website for more detailed information: http://www.oecd.org/pisa/
39852.s_name: World Bank EdStats: PISA: Mean performance on the reading scale

source.name: World Bank EdStats: PISA: Mean performance on the reading scale
